CustomField.description: The impact on the Paychex employees ability to perform their job or impacts to wages/compensation/benefits. Includes current impacts and impacts if CR is not completed. Severity of issue should consider workarounds that may lessen the severity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Impact on the Paychex employee job function or to wages/compensation/benefits (assumes workaround is in place).
0 = no impact to Paychex employees 1 = low 3 = medium, manageable 5 = high, showstopper
CustomField.label: Internal Impact Severity
